body.name: 64 oz Insulated Water Bottle with Straw & Auto Spout Lids, Paracord Handle, Half Gallon Waterbottle Strap Carrier & Protective Boot, Wide Mouth Metal Canteen Thermo Mug, Leak-proof Sports Hydro Jug
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 16 mins
features: SUPER DEAL COMBO - Buy one 64 oz insulated water bottle, get 9 accessories (2 x lids(BPA Free), 1 x paracord handle, 2 x straws(BPA Free), 1 x carrier bag, 1 x shoulder strap, 1 x protective silicone boot, 1 x straw brush)

LEAK-PROOF 2 LIDS - AUTO SPOUT LID & STRAW LID meet you different drinking need, and both lids are leak proof and with handle for carrying on the go. The pop-up spout lid features a button for one hand open quickly, and a large water outlet for fast drinking. The straw lid with straw lets you enjoy perfect spill-proof sipping to all your outdoor adventures, also can prevent the inhalation of ice cubes

DOUBLE-INSULATION HALF GALLON WATER BOTTLE - VICKNIY metal water bottle material is food-grade 18/8 stainless steel. Vacuum insulated double wall design keeps your beverage at the perfect temperature all day long(Cold-48H & Hot-24H)! The wide mouth waterbottle easy filling water and ice, water jug complete sweat-proof and has anti-slip powder coating, no more messy using

PERSONALIZATION BOTTLE PARACORD HANDLE - Thermo water bottle with a pretty cool functional paracord handle which does more than meets the eye. The survival strap cord made of military grade nylon, with compass, safety loop, metal carabiner, flint, igniter and whistle. Can help you out if you were in a survival situation while hiking, camping or everyday life

HANDS-FREE BOTTLE CARRIER BAG & PROTECTIVE BOOT - Stainless steel water bottles with shoulder strap carrier have 2 zipper storage pockets hold your phone, cards, keys. The carrying pouch also provide extra insulation, with the silicone cup mat full-protect the reusable water bottle from additional damage and extend the life of thermo hydro mug

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VICKNIY Endlessly Portable & Reusable Insulated Water Bottles This stainless steel water jug have a double-walled exterior and a vacuum seal which keeps your drinks at the desired temperature anytime, anywhere(COLD for 48-Hours & HOT for 24-Hours) Spill-proof Straw Lid & Auto Spout Chug Lid Our insulated water mug with 2 different lids to meet your different drinking needs, both lids are complete leak-proof, and design with handle perfect for carrying on-the-go Match Color Paracord Handle & Silicone Bottle Boot For both Durability & Look Durable and stylish way to carry water bottle, Paracord cord with many wild survival tools, compasses, flints, whistles, it will make your travel easier Free Your Hands & Full Protective Water Bottle Carrier Bag with Strap The storage bottle pouch with shoulder strap and zipper pockets help you tote your water bottle easily from place to place, motivate you staying hydrated throughout the day VICKNIY insulated thermal water bottle offers the combination of a sleek look and heavy duty body that can hold a decent amount of liquids, with joyful accessory make it top option to use for hydration or as a gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bottle preformed really really well for me. I recently purchased it for a summer hiking trip in Arizona and it did not disappoint. I was looking for a bottle that could keep my water cool in the 100+ degree weather, as well as handle potentially being tossed around while hiking and rock climbing. With the insulating sleeve on this bottle was able to keep ice for hours in 90-107 degree weather. Approximately 4-6 hours. The bottle itself is also pretty tough. After being tossed around, dropped, and smacking into rocks the bottle only has a few scuffs. The bottle also comes with 2 different lids, a straw/bottle cleaner, has multiple pockets on the insulation sleeve, and has a paracord handle with a compass/fire starter attached to it. (the compass is cheap and doesn't work well though.) Great bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love our water bottles! They do just as advertised and look great. I drink a lot of water and like it chilled so I was hoping for a bottle that is big enough to hold the water I drink and keep it cold. This bottle does the job exceptionally well. It has kept ice water cold inside the bottle for 2+ days. The only reason the ice melts is from me adding more room temperature water after I drink it all and even then, I only need to refill the ice once every couple of days - depending on how much I drink.The bottle colors look really nice and it has plenty of handles and grabbing points to carry it whichever way is most comfortable for you. The outside cover is great too. I used to walk out of the house with my waterbottle and a separate bag (or just juggle) with my cellphone, keys, and wallet but now I keep my cellphone and wallet inside the waterbottle’s outer cover and my keys attached to the included clasp, so all I have to do is grab my waterbottle and I’m good to go.I would highly recommend to those who need a waterbottle to keep items hot or cold, hold enough liquid for your needs, and/or need a couple extra pockets to store things along with your waterbottle.This product is well made and does the job! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am loving this bottle. It keeps my refrigerated water cool all day, with no ice! All the comments work well. Easy to clean. The case is pretty nice, I like having the option to cross body the water bottle if I need to use my hands for something else. I also like the sturdiness of the Paracord handle. It also comes with 2 straws and a cleaning brush, which is handy. The only complaint I initially had was that I couldn't see the water level. Turns out I drink MORE because I can't gage how much is left!I did have an issue. The pour spout was missing it's seal ring. After a quick conversation with the provider, it has been resolved. Quick and productive seller.Totally worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Hiking
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bottle for a road trip that involved a lot of outdoors time and hiking. My water and ice stayed cold for days. I love the versatility of different lids. The holster was something that I didn’t think was necessary, but bought this anyway because I liked the color, size, and lid options. After using it, I am so glad it came with the holster! For shorter walks, this was perfect because the zipper pouch was perfect for my keys, chapstick, and credit cards, allowing me to leave my backpack behind when I didn’t need the other items. I have several Yeti’s, Stanley’s, and an IronFlask. This is just as good as any of those. The screw on lid was leakproof for me. Awesome product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cap broke, but still good!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this water bottle for 2 months now and it's still going strong!Pros:It doesn't leak from what I've experienced, but I only ever use the wide mouth lid. (I haven't tried the straw lid yet.) It also does a good job at keeping your drinks cold. One time, I filled it up with cold water before going to bed, and it was still cold in the morning! I also specifically bought this one compared to the competitors, for the strap and sleeve. The sleeve is made of some type of neoprene material. The pockets are big enough to fit my phone, chapstick, cash, cards, etc. I've also forgone the sleeve a few times and attached the strap just to the paracord handle instead, which seems to work pretty well (shown in 3rd pic).Cons:That being said, the spring in the cap literally broke the first time I ever used it which was disappointing (shown in pics 1 and 2). Only one side broke, so the cap still functions fine for now. The 32 oz size is just barely too big to fit in my car's cup holder, but that's expected so not a big deal. Just keep that in mind if that's a feature you need. Also, the silicone boot doesn't stay on very well. I had to constantly slip it back on. While at work yesterday, it came off again and I never found it, so that sucks...I would've gave it a 5 star rating, but it's -1 star for the lid breaking the very first use :(Overall, I'm happy with the price for the quality and everything included. I can tell this bottle is gonna last me awhile, I would purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Straws Aren't Tall Enough But It's Still A Very Good Product
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 1 Gallon (128 oz) size in Red & Purple. I LOVE it! I like the size as it'll keep me motivated to finish off drinking AT LEAST a gallon a day of water. This also comes with the cozy which you can carry your phone and keys attached to it into the gym. I love that feature because this will be great to carry along things I need with me at the gym. There's a compass and a whistle attached. I do go hiking in the mountains so those may come in handy when I'm in the outdoors. There's straws that come with this but the straws are the only draw back for me personally because they're not tall enough for this size of a water bottle. I was really hoping for a tall enough straw. Hopefully one day soon this brand will offer a taller reusable straw because that's all this needs to become a completely perfect product. Shipping was awesome, it came a day earlier than expected and it was all packed so nicely with care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good water bottle
reviews.reviewText: The thing I like most is the carrying case that comes with this specific water bottle, convenient for hands free carrying with nice pockets. Keep water cold all day.
